scene-transitions.setting.show-journal-h: Enable to display a 'Play as Transition' button on journal windows that when clicked will play the selected page like a scene transition
scene-transitions.setting.resetAllSettin: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
scene-transitions.setting.debug.name: Enable Debugging
scene-transitions.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
scene-transitions.setting.debug.hint: Enable to help debug issues with this module, otherwise disable this option during normal use
scene-transitions.form.button.save.label: Save and Close
scene-transitions.form.contentType.label: Content Type
scene-transitions.form.rollTable.label: Roll Table
scene-transitions.form.rollTable.note: The selected roll table will be rolled to determine the transition text content
scene-transitions.form.gmHide.label: Hide for GM
scene-transitions.form.gmHide.note: Do not show the transition for GMs
scene-transitions.form.fontColor.label: Font Color
scene-transitions.form.fontSize.label: Font Size
scene-transitions.form.activateScene.not: Activate the scene when the transition is played
scene-transitions.form.bgImg.label: Image/Video
scene-transitions.form.bgPos.label: Position
scene-transitions.form.bgPos.note: Uses CSS values, such as: bottom, center, top, 100px 100px
scene-transitions.form.bgLoop.label: Loop Video
scene-transitions.form.bgMuted.label: Mute Video
scene-transitions.form.bgSize.label: Size
scene-transitions.form.bgSize.note: Uses CSS values, such as: auto, contain, cover, 50%
scene-transitions.form.bgColor.label: Color
scene-transitions.form.bgOpacity.label: Opacity
scene-transitions.form.fadeIn.label: Fade-In
scene-transitions.form.delay.label: Duration
scene-transitions.form.delay.note: How long the transition will stay on-screen
scene-transitions.form.fadeOut.label: Fade-Out
scene-transitions.form.volume.label: Volume
scene-transitions.form.audio.label: Audio
scene-transitions.form.audioLoop.label: Loop Audio
scene-transitions.form.allowPlayersToEnd: Allow players to end the transition on their client
scene-transitions.form.gmEndAll.label: End Transition for Everyone
scene-transitions.form.gmEndAll.note: When the GM ends the transition, end it for everyone
scene-transitions.form.showUI.label: Allow Players to Use Foundry UI
scene-transitions.form.showUI.note: Allow players to use the Foundry UI while the transition is playing
scene-transitions.scene.config.title: Scene Transitions
